mapper.select:
SELECT a.url ,a.type ,a.sort ,a.id ,a.pid ,a.name ,a.icon ,a.permission ,a.visible FROM boot_sys_menu a ,boot_sys_role b ,boot_sys_role_menu c ,boot_sys_user_role e WHERE a.id = c.menu_id AND c.role_id = b.id AND b.id = e.role_id AND e.user_id = #{userId} and a.del_flag = 0
and a.type = #{type} and a.visible = 0
group by a.url ,a.type ,a.sort ,a.id ,a.pid ,a.name ,a.icon ,a.permission ,a.visible order by a.sort desc

select id ,pid ,`name` ,icon ,url ,`type` ,permission ,visible ,sort from boot_sys_menu where del_flag = 0
and `type` = #{type} and visible = 0
and `name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by sort desc

select a.id ,a.pid ,a.`name` ,a.icon ,a.url ,a.`type` ,a.permission ,a.visible ,a.sort from boot_sys_menu a join boot_sys_package_menu b on b.menu_id = a.id join boot_sys_tenant c on c.package_id = b.package_id where a.del_flag = 0 and c.id = #{tenantId}
and a.`type` = #{type} and a.visible = 0
and a.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by a.sort desc
select id ,pid ,`name` ,sort ,`type` ,icon ,url ,permission ,visible from boot_sys_menu where id = #{id}
